# this one is partially covered. We explode every comprehension having as value a comprehension,
# but do not explode the inner comprehension (yet). This requires big changes, as it's not really
# frequent, so let's use #fmt: off/on for now
x = [[i for i in range(8) if i < 4] for j in range(10)]

x = [[get_food(self) for i in range(4) if i < 4] for j in range(10)]
